item.title: Git and Github From the Coding Train
item.description: The Coding Train | Git and Github for Poets | Youtube Playlist This is a very easy to watch 11 video set playlist, which led to looking for a way to get the thumbnail for the first video on the playlist. Searched for “youtube thumbnail grab” and found Get YouTube Thumbnail which returns images and links when the youtube link is entered,for large and small thumbnails. these two are shown below:

item.title: 0737 | Youtube Videos to Watch
item.description: Youtube videos on CSS, websites, data science, git, Jamstack codeSTACKr | Learn CSS Grid in 20 minutes Antonin Januska | CSS Grids For Responsive Blog-Site Layouts CSS 1 line layouts, with youtube link Netlify Tutorial - How to build and deploy websites using Netlify Git and GitHub for Beginners - Crash Course JAMstack Course - Build websites that are simpler, faster, and more secure Geeklaunch | How to make a website and put it online 2017 tutorial (Hugo, Linux) Other websites of interest Hugo blog setup hugo favicon

item.title: 0735 | Publish Hugo Website on Github
item.description: GeekLaunch has a Youtube Hugo playlist (7 videos) Youtube | GeekLaunch | How to make a website and put it online 2017 Tutorial (Hugo, Linux) Github youtube shortcode Web: Sign into github account Web: Create new repository and copy the address for the git remote add origin Terminal: navigate to green websites/hugo-harrycresswell This is where some Hugo testing is in progress. Terminal: git commands git init git remote add origin https://github.

item.title: 0729 | markdown crash course
item.description: Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Heading 6 italic with single asterisk or use escape to show _underline_ or *asterisk* _italic with single underscore _ bold with double asterisk bold with double underscore strike through Triple underscore or hyphen for a horizontal line this is a blockquote on multiple lines Markdown Crash Course Markdown Crash Course Item one Item two Item three Nested more nested back to normal more first inserted second third inline code block <p>paragraph</p>
